comments.body:
shell scripts that are mains should set the options:

```
set -o nounset
set -o errexit
set -o pipefail
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@# See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
# limitations under the License.

# Use other Debian mirror
sed -i -e "s/http.us.debian.org/mirrors.kernel.org/" /etc/apt/sources.list
